SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: Get User List XML
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GETUSERLISTXML ( @USERLIST xml = null output ) as begin SELECT @USERLIST = (SELECT ID, USERNAME, CAST(0 as bit) SELECTED FROM ( SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT ID, USERNAME FROM dbo.APPUSER WHERE USERNAME IS NOT NULL AND USERNAME <> '' AND ISSYSTEM = 0 AND ISSYSADMIN = 0 ORDER BY USERNAME ASC ) sdf ORDER BY USERNAME ASC FOR XML PATH('Item'), ROOT('USERLIST') ) end
